name: Financial Institution Value Streams
description: Example value stream architecture for a financial institution showing key value delivery flows

nodes.name: Retail Customer
nodes.description: Individual consumer seeking personal banking products and services including checking accounts, savings accounts, credit cards, and loans.

nodes.name: Business Customer
nodes.description: Commercial entity requiring business banking services including merchant accounts, business loans, and cash management solutions.

nodes.name: Onboard Retail Customer
nodes.description: End-to-end process of acquiring and activating new retail banking customers from initial interest through first product usage.
nodes.value: Active banking relationship with accessible accounts and services ready for use

nodes.name: Process Loan Application
nodes.description: Complete journey from loan inquiry through funding, including application submission, creditworthiness assessment, approval decision, and disbursement.
nodes.value: Approved loan with funds disbursed to meet customer's financial need

nodes.name: Resolve Customer Issue
nodes.description: Service flow handling customer inquiries, complaints, and problems from initial contact through resolution and follow-up.
nodes.value: Satisfactory resolution of customer concern with restored confidence in the institution

nodes.name: Execute Payment
nodes.description: Payment processing flow from initiation through settlement, covering domestic and international transfers with fraud prevention and compliance checks.
nodes.value: Funds transferred securely and accurately to intended recipient within expected timeframe

nodes.name: Acquire Business Banking Relationship
nodes.description: Commercial customer acquisition process including needs assessment, product recommendations, account setup, and business services activation.
nodes.value: Established business banking relationship with tailored services supporting company operations

nodes.name: Manage Merchant Services
nodes.description: Ongoing delivery of payment acceptance services from merchant onboarding through transaction processing, settlement, and reporting.
nodes.value: Operational payment acceptance capability enabling business revenue collection

relationships.description: Retail Customer initiates Onboard Retail Customer value stream
Retail Customer initiates Process Loan Application value stream
Retail Customer initiates Resolve Customer Issue value stream
Retail Customer initiates Execute Payment value stream
Business Customer initiates Acquire Business Banking Relationship value stream
